power.title: Careful Stride
power.fluff: You walk with such precision and control that broken ground or even bodies water cannot impede you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you ignore difficult terrain and can both move across liquid and stand on it as if it were solid ground. You also don't trigger traps or hazards that would trigger based on weight if you are aware of them, at your DM's discretion.
You move up to you speed.

power.title: Cat and Mouse
power.fluff: You step into your enemy's bind spot after a successful attack and leave it casting about to find you

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a melee attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to 3 squares to a space adjacent to the triggering enemy.
Until the start of your next turn or until you take damage from an attack, whichever comes first, you have total concealment against the triggering enemy.

If the triggering attack was a critical hit, you can also make a Stealth check to hide from the triggering enemy as part of the shift, though any other enemies are still fully aware of you and likely to break your hiding.

power.title: Deflect Arrow
power.fluff: Your foe attempts to strike you from afar, so you focus your energy and spin away from their attacks

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: A ranged Weapon attack hits or misses you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of your next turn, you gain the following benefits:
Superior cover against ranged Weapon attacks, generally meaning those attacks have a -5 penalty to attack rolls against you from cover.
When a ranged Weapon attack misses you, you can shift 1 square as a free reaction.
This effect immediately ends if you cannot take actions.

section.name: Sustain Minor:
section.text: The effect persists until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Special:
section.text: Your DM might allow you to trigger and apply this power's effects against non-Weapon attacks that are physical in nature.

power.title: Fall of Wind
power.fluff: You have meditated on the nature of the air around you and can control it to cushion your fall

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You fall

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You reduce the damage you take from the fall by 5 + one-half your level.

power.title: Fighting Fury Stance
power.fluff: Your discipline and control let you channel your anger into each blow

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You assume the Fighting Fury stance.

Until the stance ends, your unarmed melee attacks, including your monk melee Implement attacks, deal additional damage equal to one-half your Strength modifier or one-half your Charisma modifier, whichever is higher. This increases to your Strength modifier or your Charisma modifier, whichever is higher, if the attack is or counts as a melee basic attack.

power.title: Grasp the Wind
power.fluff: Before your enemy can force you back, you whirl around, using the power of the attack to propel you where you want to go

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You are pulled, pushed, or slid

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Instead of being affected by the triggering forced movement, you shift up to the number of squares it would have moved you. If you shifd outside the range of the triggering attack or other effect, you take half damage from it but it is not invalidated.

power.title: Harmonious Discipline
power.fluff: A specific sequence of disciplined breathing enhances both your defense and subsequent offense

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain temporary hit points equal to one-third your level + your Wisdom modifier or your Constitution modifier, whichever is higher.

When you have no temporary hit points remaining, you gain a bonus to the first damage roll for a melee attack you make before the end of your following turn. The bonus equals your Wisdom modifier or your Constitution modifier, whichever is higher.

power.title: Reed in the Wind
power.fluff: You get ready to spin with a blow and then snap back with a quick threat of your own

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy targets you with an attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You take half damage from the triggering attack.

Once the triggering attack has been resolved, you gain combat advantage against he triggering enemy until the end of your next turn. If the triggering attack missed you, you also gain a bonus to the first damage roll you make against the triggering enemy. The bonus equal your Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, Wisdom modifier, or Charisma modifier, whichever is highest.

power.title: Supreme Flurry
power.fluff: Your speed is a blur that makes it impossible to tell where one strike ends and another begins

section.name: Prerequisite:
section.text: You must have a Flurry of Blows class power.

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You use your Flurry of Blows class power

section.name: Effect:
section.text: After resolving both the Flurry of Blows power as well as the power that triggered it, you shift up to half your speed and use your Flurry of Blows class power again.

power.title: Swift Flight
power.fluff: Channeling psionic energy through palms pointed at the ground, your simple leap becomes a smooth glide across the battlefield

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You fly up to a number of squares equal to 1 + one-half your speed + your Strength modifier, Constitution modifier, Wisdom modifier, or Charisma modifier, whichever is highest. If you don't land at the end of this movement, you fall.
